hero.title: Fueled by Fusion Nutrition
hero.paragraph:
The pyramid says it all. Nutrition is the foundation of everything we do. Our programs are open to everyone, you do not need to be a member of our gym to take full advantage of our nutrition services.

We use simple behavior modification strategies to create positive change without the stress of “dieting.” The internet is filled with fad diet plans, and there are a lot of programs out there telling you what NOT to eat. But what if we could obtain this confidence by learning what to eat using whole foods with limited ingredients? Behold, a teaching program to build life-long skills one step at a time.

how_it_works.title: HOW DOES FUELED BY FUSION NUTRITION WORK?
how_it_works.paragraph: Our nutrition program is a two-phase approach. Each of our options provides varying levels of accountability so you feel you’ll need to be successful! Whether you’re looking to lose weight, get more energy, or gain muscle, our nutrition program provides individualized coaching to help you reach specific goals.

boxes.title: Phase 1 : Determine baseline
boxes.paragraph: During Phase 1 we determine a nutrition baseline. We set you up with a customized plan, and test biometrics.

boxes.title: Phase 2 : Ongoing coaching
boxes.paragraph: Phase 2 is Ongoing Coaching where we focus on accountability and tweaking the plan to see optimal results.

how_it_works.bottom_paragraph: We don’t guess. We offer scientific body composition tracking in order to follow your success. Changing your eating habits is a lifestyle change, therefore, we offer up to weekly accountability sessions to help keep you on track.

icon_box.title: Proven Record of Success
icon_box.paragraph: Stop wasting your time with FAD diets, let the nutrition experts lead you in the right direction to help you achieve your health  and fitness goals.

icon_box.title: Written by Registered Dietitian, Nicole Aucoin
icon_box.paragraph: Nicole empowers clients to make lifestyle changes. She provides health coaching  through diet and exercise to help her clients meet their goals.

icon_box.title: Education and accountability
icon_box.paragraph: Different packages are available based on the client’s needs. We will meet you where you are at nutritionally and help you reach your goals and achieve success.

success_stories.story: Ford 1 year of nutrition coaching went from 232lbs & 35.4% body fat to 195lbs & 10.7% body fat.

details.detail: 4 week customized meal plans (with grocery lists)
Access to exclusive HSN App & group messaging board with fellow nutrition clients

bottom_cta.title: When was the last time you did something for the first time?
bottom_cta.paragraph: Start today. 6 months from now, you’ll be glad you did.

hero.title: Realizing Your Potential
hero.paragraph:
There’s something to potential. We all have it but so few fully realize it. When we’re working out of it, it’s easy to press through. To fight. To win. To keep going. It’s in those moments of struggle and of breakthrough where we find what we’re truly capable of.

But not everyone is there and that’s where we come in; the champions of potential, the motivators of more, the community that keeps you coming back. You see, it’s the belief that everyone who steps through our doors is capable of more that gets us up early, keeps us out late, and keeps us going for higher, stronger, faster, better. We’re not in this for us, we’re in it for you.

history_section.title: History
history_section.paragraph: From behind the Chow Time buffet, to inside our new facility off S and S Greenway, Fusion has come a long way since opening our doors in 2012.

value.title: We Go Together
value.paragraph: We’re firmly rooted in the notion that you cannot become your best by yourself. It takes a team, a village, a group of people to push, to strive, to encourage, to develop, and to achieve something more than what we thought possible. When we go together, we’re capable of more than if we went it alone.

value.title: A Community That Keeps
value.paragraph: It’s once been said that curiosity brings you to the door, but community keeps you there. We’re aware of the intrigue found in something new and different, but we don’t settle for just curiosity. We push each other for more and it’s in those moments that we find the community that keeps us going, progressing, and bettering ourselves.

value.title: Embracing Failure
value.paragraph: The only way to get better is to get back up. “Eating it” is a natural part of progress and without it, nothing grows, no one gets better, and we’re left with the unsatisfying taste of familiarity and failure. Grueling step by grueling step, we embrace failure and celebrate it, as it’s in the mire of disappointment where we rise from what was and move towards what can be with when we take just one more step.

homepage_slider_content.title: On Ramp
homepage_slider_content.paragraph: This is a 4 part series that's designed to help you learn the basic movements of CrossFit in a controlled, small group, hands-on environment.

listing_page_content.title: On Ramp
listing_page_content.paragraph: This is a 4 part series that's designed to help you learn the basic movements of CrossFit in a controlled, small group, hands-on environment.

hero.title: On Ramp
hero.paragraph:
To begin your fitness journey, Fusion Training requires participation in our On Ramp course. This is a 4 part series that's designed to help you learn the basic movements of CrossFit in a controlled, small group, hands-on environment. New members will be introduced to the amenities of the box, how to use Wodify (our online performance and nutrition tracking software), and the culture and atmosphere of Fusion. 

The ultimate goal for our On Ramp program is to make your experience the absolute best it can be!

homepage_slider_content.title: Thrive
homepage_slider_content.paragraph: If your doctor has told you that you need a consistent diet and exercise or if you are intimidated by gyms with countless machines, banging weights, and loud music, then Thrive is for you.

listing_page_content.title: Thrive
listing_page_content.paragraph: If your doctor has told you that you need a consistent diet and exercise or if you are intimidated by gyms with countless machines, banging weights, and loud music, then Thrive is for you.

hero.title: Thrive
hero.paragraph:
If your doctor has told you that you need a consistent diet and exercise or if you are intimidated by gyms with countless machines, banging weights, and loud music, then Thrive is for you. Coaches will help you understand every movement and scale to your own particular strengths and limits, meeting you where you are on your fitness journey.

If you don’t want to merely survive but Thrive, this class is for you!

homepage_slider_content.title: Fusion Kids
homepage_slider_content.paragraph: Fusion Kids teaches not only basic physical skills but also social skills and confidence. Children learn foundational movements like the squat, push-ups, pull-ups, climbing, jumping, and elementary gymnastic movements.

listing_page_content.title: Fusion Kids
listing_page_content.paragraph: Fusion Kids teaches not only basic physical skills but also social skills and confidence. Children learn foundational movements like the squat, push-ups, pull-ups, climbing, jumping, and elementary gymnastic movements.

hero.title: Fusion Kids
hero.paragraph:
Fusion Kids teaches not only basic physical skills but also social skills and confidence. Children learn foundational movements like the squat, push-ups, pull-ups, climbing, jumping, and elementary gymnastic movements.

More importantly, you will see your child also learns to follow directions, listen, communicate, and play with others. Every class includes fitness gameplay and positive reinforcement. Your child’s confidence, both physically and mentally, will grow with each class.

homepage_slider_content.title: X⁴
homepage_slider_content.paragraph:
4 STATIONS IN 40 MINUTES. 
One of the main pillars of interval training is variety. In X⁴, you will rotate through four stations, each offering something new.

listing_page_content.title: X⁴
listing_page_content.paragraph:
4 STATIONS IN 40 MINUTES. 
One of the main pillars of interval training is variety. In X⁴, you will rotate through four stations, each offering something new. While our stations remain the same, the movements performed and equipment used in each station varies daily in order to keep you constantly engaged and challenged.

hero.title: X⁴
hero.paragraph:
4 STATIONS IN 40 MINUTES. 
One of the main pillars of interval training is variety. In X⁴, you will rotate through four stations, each offering something new. While our stations remain the same, the movements performed and equipment used in each station varies daily in order to keep you constantly engaged and challenged.

homepage_slider_content.title: CrossFit
homepage_slider_content.paragraph: Whether your goal is to get stronger, lose weight, run faster, or just look better in a swimsuit, Fusion’s high-intensity CrossFit classes deliver greater results in less time than any other workout in Statesboro.

listing_page_content.title: CrossFit
listing_page_content.paragraph: Whether your goal is to get stronger, lose weight, run faster, or just look better in a swimsuit, Fusion’s high-intensity group classes deliver greater results in less time than any other workout in Statesboro.

hero.title: CrossFit
hero.paragraph: Fusion Training is the home of CrossFit Boro. We have 35 CrossFit classes weekly for all levels. Whether your goal is to get stronger, lose weight, run faster, or just look better in a swimsuit, Fusion’s high-intensity group classes deliver greater results in less time than any other workout in Statesboro. Breakaway from the same boring workout every day, get individualized attention in each class, and find the community and motivation you need for optimal fitness, nutrition, recovery, and wellness, all in one place.

hero.title: Something for Every Body
hero.paragraph: We begin training our clients at 4 years old and have some well into their golden years. No matter where you are in your fitness/wellness journey we have something for you.
